dt: {bc}a slender roll of cut tobacco enclosed in paper and meant to be smoked
{bc}a similar roll of another substance (such as marijuana)

et: French {it}cigarette{/it}, diminutive of {it}cigare{/it} cigar, from Spanish {it}cigarro{/it}
shortdef: a slender roll of cut tobacco enclosed in paper and meant to be smoked; also : a similar roll of another substance (such as marijuana)
